abstract: Berkshire Hathaway successfully bid for a 47,000-loan portfolio held by Residential Capital, the bankrupt mortgage lender, paying $1.5 billion.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway successfully bid for a 47,000-loan portfolio held by Residential Capital, the bankrupt mortgage lender, paying $1.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett said on Wednesday that he was “salivating” to strike another big deal. But it appears that he’ll settle for a $1.5 billion one for now.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway Wins Bid for ResCap Loans

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
